channel.title: Zombie strangling the guard can't be killed
channel.description:
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a2a at: -1755 x, -1172 y, 89 z
setpos -1755.618530 -1172.174683 89.031250;setang 6.072031 -166.800400 0.000000
Office Complex, the part where you eventually get the .357. The security member is talking about a headcrab being on his friend's head and the zombie is coming, while the player may still think something could be done about that, then the zombie grabs the guard by neck. The problem is that you are able to kill the zombie before the animation starts, but when it's actually strangling the guard, it is invulnerable. (I tried a full pistol cartridge and a gluon gun to be sure.)
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
